headline: Citi Turns More Positive on PPG as Housing Tailwinds Emerge
summary: PPG Industries, Inc. (NYSE:PPG) is included among the 13 Best February Dividend Stocks to Buy. On January 19, Citi raised its price target on PPG Industries, Inc. (NYSE:PPG) to $127 from $120 and maintained a Buy rating on the stock. The firm said the stock is starting to price in a more supportive housing environment […]

headline: Is PPG Industries (PPG) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: Investors may be wondering whether PPG Industries at around US$113.96 is offering good value right now, or if the easy gains are already off the table. The share price has returned 1.3% over the last week and 9.3% over the last month, while the year-to-date return is 9.2% and the 1-year return is a 4.4% decline, with a 7.8% decline over 3 years and a 10.1% decline over 5 years. Recent coverage of PPG Industries has focused on how investors are reassessing materials and coatings stocks in...

headline: PPG Industries Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: PPG Industries (NYSE:PPG) executives said the company delivered “solid” performance in 2025 despite what CEO Tim Knavish described as a “very mixed and dynamic macroeconomic environment,” with fourth-quarter results marking the firm’s strongest organic growth of the year.
